creditline: Gift from the Collection of John and Robyn Horn
description: black and turquoise egg-shaped vessel, with natural wood interior and irregular rim, on 4 stilts; turquoise stilts have protruding black spikes and animal hairs; stilts painted and carved with fish, snakes, insects and figures
signed: on one leg near bottom, incised: [MH / 93]
title: Traveling Bowl
